I've been anonymous for 7 years.

My real name is Joseph Ayoub, I was the Crypto Research Lead @Citi

I quit to build the future of Crypto x AI

An underrated project I want to see do well is ValiDAO. The validator layer on many L1s needs better decentralization.  It's importance is explained well in this thread by Jake (Co-founder of https://t.co/ArhSid0NZa another good project)

The past, present and future of crypto will always be in its users. 

Via decentralisation we reduce barriers to entry so that anyone, anywhere can exist on-chain with us. 

But part of this sacred culture is the idea of distributing wealth. The notion that anyone with a wallet…

Raising doesn't equal success. But it is proof that people believe in the eco.

So @dymension Mainnet is live, none of the validators can reach consensus because there is a bad validator in the set, Chorus One, with 34.8% of the staked tokens delegated to it. https://t.co/CANQQExHjC
One day we'll be arguing about Planeterian decentralisation and the need for more validators on Mars

As a founder myself, people complaining about $JUP team selling tokens are delusional.

250m JUP doesn't come close to repaying the years of dedication, hard work & risk this team took.

There are so many grifters in this space, don't hate on teams that actually provide value.

@rug_ai @Crypto_Joe10 @Pauly0x Without doxing my bag value (it’s not that exciting)

@theapeterminal We’d like to clarify that our thread was a data-driven analysis on the $SAVM launch.

We aim to provide impartial analysis of publicly available on-chain data, and do not have information on the identities of the wallets in our tweets.

Delusion is believing DApps will onboard the next 100 million users. 

The next crypto revolution lies in consumer interfaces that bridge the gap to the decentralised world. 

We’ve won when people don‘t realise they’re using crypto.

The reality is that crypto’s greatest innovations come from product market fit for “Degens”

From Uniswap to Blur, our greatest innovations stem from the desire to explore

As a founder of a “degen” project, believe me when I say we’ll on-board the next 10 million users on-chain

The best trades are normally at a certain time, not a certain price. 

Asymmetry lies in turning points that occur during specific events or periods. 

Turning points allows you to take more risk & make better trades.
